availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Coleby A. Smith (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Phebe Janes Williams Smith. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in 1860. Justice of the peace in Hopkins County in 1865.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 182; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 19; Find A Grave, "Coleby A. Smith (1827-1891)," Memorial #66863472, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=66863472&ref=acom (accessed May 9, 2017).
